Clifton.Passaic County Vocational School Distric:
The Passaic County Vocational School District is a comprehensive vocational public school district based in Wayne serving the vocational and training needs of high school students in ninth through twelfth grades and adults from Passaic County, New Jersey, United States.
As of the 2014-15 school year, the district and its one school had an enrollment of 3,355 students and 297.5 classroom teachers (on an FTE basis), for a student–teacher ratio of 11.3:1.


== School ==
Passaic County Technical Institute (PCTI) is a four-year countywide vocational public high school located on a campus in Wayne.
